name: Low Battery
description:
Low Battery

Ludum Dare Entry Page

Outmaneuver your enemies in this turn-based puzzler. You play as a security robot who has a suspiciously small battery.

Every move costs you some energy. Remove all intruders from each room without losing power.

  • Move with the Arrow Keys or WASD
  • Move toward an enemy to attack
  • Remove all enemies to advance
